feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React shell with header, tab navigation, theming, Pro mode provider, and routed screens.
frontend/src/features/docs/ArchitectureP: Documentation viewer with tabbed sections displaying architecture, pipeline, styling, and code excerpts.
frontend/src/features/docs/docsContent.t: Exports HTML-formatted documentation strings for architecture, pipeline, styling, and code examples.
frontend/src/features/editor/EditorScree: Wraps the editor layout with the global editor state provider.
frontend/src/features/editor/export/expo: Provides functions to export the editor canvas as PNG, JPG, SVG, or WebM animation using brand name–based filenames.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/B: UI controls for selecting the scene's background mode through a dropdown.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/C: Displays camera effects settings, currently limited to disabled placeholders for upcoming features.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/E: Controls bloom, rim light, and particle effects, including intensity sliders and Pro‑gated options.
UI for exporting outputs in multiple formats and resolutions with Pro restrictions and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/G: Sliders for adjusting text extrusion, bevel size, and bevel smoothness.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/I: The main inspector container organizing geometry, material, effects, and export tabs plus brand name input.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/L: Controls for light intensity, angle, and shadow settings with conditional sliders for shadow properties.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/M: UI controls for selecting style, material preset, surface sliders, and uploading a custom texture.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/T: Rotation sliders for X/Y/Z axes with a reset button tied to editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/layout/Edit: Defines the main editor layout with resizable panels for presets, viewport, inspector, and a bottom timeline.
frontend/src/features/editor/logo/materi: Generates a MeshStandardMaterial based on style, material preset, roughness, metalness, and optional texture.
frontend/src/features/editor/logo/ThreeT: Renders the 3D text logo with live material, rotation, and animation updates from editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/LogoViewpor: Three.js canvas rendering the 3D logo with camera, controls, lighting, background, particles, and post‑processing.
frontend/src/features/editor/presets/Pre: Displays clickable brand style presets that apply predefined editor state configurations.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Backg: Sets the scene background and fog based on the selected background mode.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Light: Configures ambient, directional, and optional rim lighting using angles and intensity from editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Parti: Creates animated particle points whose count and movement depend on particle intensity settings.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/PostP: Sets up postprocessing with bloom using EffectComposer, updating passes when bloom settings change.
frontend/src/features/editor/state/edito: Defines the editor state model, default values, and functions to update state, reset transforms, and apply brand presets.
frontend/src/features/editor/texture/Dra: Adds a drag‑and‑drop area that reads dropped image files as data URLs and updates the editor's custom texture state.
frontend/src/features/editor/timeline/Ti: UI strip for animation controls including play/pause, reset, and a slider to adjust animation speed.
frontend/src/features/pro/FreeVsProPanel: Displays Free vs Pro plan cards, a demo toggle, and a comparison of feature availability.
frontend/src/features/pro/ProModeContext: Provides a React context for toggling Pro mode and exposing its state to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, custom scrollbars, and global typography/theme rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and existing feature definitions for the build.
